title.narrative: AUAF – Support for the American University of Afghanistan

description.narrative: (Afghanistan): With FY2017 funds, USAID will continue to assist the American University of Afghanistan (AUAF) to provide a high quality liberal arts, English language university education to increase employability of Afghan youth and adults while meeting the labor market demand for qualified professionals. FY2017 funds will support AUAF in the following four components: 1) strengthening academic and professional development programs; 2) enhancing quality of programs; 3) expanding programs for women; and, 4) increasing institutional sustainability. This activity was recently extended through November 30, 2019 to support the expansion of scholarships for Afghan women as well as other opportunities. Due to this increased scope, the AUAF Bridge Activity (IM: IM 103528). will also provide support AUAF in the above mentioned areas.

title.narrative: Mid-term evaluation of the American University of Afghanistan
